articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: ‘Absolutely intolerable’: China slams US and EU Hong Kong Tiananmen candles - The Guardian
articles.description: Tributes lit in the windows of the US consulate building and the European Union’s office are a ‘political show’, says China
articles.content:
China has berated the US and EU consulates in Hong Kong for displaying candles to commemorate the Tiananmen Square massacre , blasting it as a clumsy political show to destabilise the city.
Candles … [+1731 chars]

articles.title: Canada looking to U.S. to help end Moderna delivery delays - 680 News
articles.description: Procurement Minister Anita Anand says Canada is trying to negotiate a deal to start getting doses of Moderna's COVID-19 vaccine from the United States instead of Europe.
articles.content:
Procurement Minister Anita Anand says Canada is trying to negotiate a deal to start getting doses of Moderna’s COVID-19 vaccine from the United States instead of Europe.
